import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, CardFooter, Card, CardHeader } from "shards-react"; import Dai from "../pages/static/asset.svg" import PoolTotalChart from "./charts/PoolTotalLine.js" import PoolInterestBar from "./charts/PoolInterestBar.js" import AssetTotalDoughNut from "./charts/AssetTotalDough.js" import ChartDataAll from "./api/ChartData.js" export default class PoolTraker extends React.Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { chartData:{} } } UNSAFE_componentWillMount(){ this.getchartData(); } getchartData(){ // Ajax calls here this.setState({ chartData:{ labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'], datasets:[ { label:'Revenue', data:[ 1617, 1881, 1903, 1606, 2105, 1950 ], backgroundColor:[ '#007bff' ], borderColor:'none', pointRadius:0, borderDash:[], lineTension: 0.3, borderWidth:0 } ] }, chartDataBar:{ labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun'], datasets:[ { label:'Pool Depth', data:[ 1617200, 1881121, 1903932, 1706677, 2105099, 1950333 ], backgroundColor:[ '#007bff', '#007bff', '#007bff', '#007bff', '#007bff', '#007bff' ], } ] }, chartDataDough:{ labels: [ 'Assets Sold', 'Assents Owned' ], datasets: [{ data: [30, 4], backgroundColor: [ '#007bff', '#FFCE56' ], hoverBackgroundColor: [ '#007bff', '#FFCE56' ] }] } }); } render() { return (
